company_context: FourKites: AI Supply Chain Orchestration & Visibility Platform ✕ Welcome to FourKites Loft AI Orchestration Platform That Works Across Any Enterprise System with Intelligence from Outside Your Four Walls ENTER THE LOFT Skip to Main Content AI agents that autonomously execute supply chain operations Built on the world’s first Intelligent Control Tower —powered by the largest supply chain network with 1.1M carriers and suppliers across 200+ territories and countries Talk to An Expert Meet The Digital Workforce Supply Chain Intelligence That Thinks, Decides, and Acts Autonomous Resolution Unified Orchestration Revenue Protection Predictive Intelligence Autonomous Resolution 85% of exceptions resolve themselves AI agents handle the routine so you can focus on strategy. Trained on patterns from 200+ Fortune 500 supply chains. Learn more 2.5x capacity without adding headcount using Digital Worker Polly Unified Orchestration Every digital twin, working as one Orders know about shipments. Inventory knows about delays. Facilities know about inbound flow. Powered by cross-industry learning no other platform can match. Learn more “Utilizing FourKites helps all our teams internally to access data on the spot.” Ferenc Polgar Crop Protection Transportation Lead, Bayer Revenue Protection See what’s at risk before it’s too late Real-time visibility into revenue impact. Autonomous mitigation of threats. Benchmarked against billions of shipments to predict revenue exposure before it materializes. Learn more "FourKites empowers us to stay ahead of delays and disruptions, while shaping discussions that drive cost reduction.” Amy Moe Global Logistics Analyst, Brown Forman Predictive Intelligence Problems solved weeks before they arrive While competitors react to disruptions, you’re preventing them. Pattern recognition trained on a decade of cross-industry supply chain outcomes. Get started 4% improvement in on-time delivery within one year From Disruption to Resolution, Automatically Most supply chain AI is trained on single-company data. Ours learned from 1,600+ businesses solving the same problems you face—across every industry, mode, and geography. When a disruption hits, our agents already know what works. Asset Not Assigned A hurdle in tracking your order or shipment. Tracy proactively contacts carriers to add asset information, ensuring your shipment is tracked. Late for Pickup An early sign that a pickup might be missed. Tracy reaches out to your carrier to understand any delays, proactively notifying teams of any changes. Pickup Appointment Missed A critical failure that can cascade into serious disruptions. Alan automatically reschedules pickup and delivery times based on new ETAs. Lack of Supplier Visibility A production and OTIF headwind. Sam takes any data—emails, BOLs, and more—and creates a trackable order for any vendor. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm a Sales Development Representative at DeepData AI. I came across FourKites and was impressed with your work in supply chain orchestration. I'd like to discuss how our data processing solution can help you optimize your operations.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, thanks for reaching out, Alex. I'm John, the CTO here at FourKites. We're always looking for ways to improve our processes, but I have to say, our plate is pretty full right now. What makes you think your solution is a good fit for us?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Well, John, our DeepData AI platform is designed to help companies like yours process large amounts of data quickly and efficiently. With your focus on supply chain visibility, I think we could help you gain even more insights from your data and make better decisions.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I see. That sounds interesting, but we've already invested heavily in our own data analytics platform. I'm not sure we're looking to add another tool to the mix, especially if it's going to require significant integration work. How does your platform integrate with existing systems?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a great question, John. Our platform is designed to be highly flexible and can integrate with a wide range of systems. We've worked with companies in the supply chain space before, and I think we could make it work for you. Plus, our pricing is very competitive, and I think we could offer you a good deal.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate that, Alex, but to be honest, I'm not the person who makes purchasing decisions for new tools like this. Our CFO is in charge of budgeting, and I'm not sure we have the budget for something like this right now. Even if I was interested, I wouldn't be able to approve it.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand, John. Perhaps I could schedule a follow-up call with your CFO to discuss the potential benefits and ROI of our platform? I'd be happy to provide a customized demo and answer any questions they may have.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, Alex, but I think it's best if we just focus on our existing priorities for now. We're not looking to add any new tools or vendors to our roster at this time, and I don't see that changing in the near future. Thank you for reaching out, but I think we'll have to pass on DeepData AI for now.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Authority
Feedback: The seller should have asked about and involved the decision-maker, in this case the CFO, earlier in the conversation to potentially change the outcome. Sentiment: Neutral
